Here's a pre-disaster satellite image. Please wait for the post-disaster image to make the comparison.
Pre-disaster satellite image noted. Awaiting the post-disaster image for damage analysis.
train/images/midwest-flooding_00000001_post_disaster.png
This is the post-disaster satellite image. Compare with the previous pre-disaster image and evaluate building damage.

**Disaster Impact Assessment Report**

Disaster Type: Flooding

**Building Analysis Summary:**
Total buildings analyzed: 143
• No damage: 119 buildings (83.2%) - These structures show no visible signs of damage
• Unclassified damage: 24 buildings (16.8%) - Damage extent unclear from satellite imagery

**Impact Severity:**
Classification: Minimal Impact
Assessment: The disaster appears to have caused minimal structural damage to buildings in this area.

**Key Observations:**

**Recommended Response Actions:**
• Monitoring recommended, but immediate emergency response may not be critical
train/images/midwest-flooding_00000002_pre_disaster.png

I've received the pre-disaster satellite image. Please provide the post-disaster image so I can conduct a comprehensive damage assessment.
train/images/midwest-flooding_00000002_post_disaster.png
This is the post-disaster satellite image of the same area. Compare this with the previous pre-disaster image and assess building damage patterns.

**Disaster Impact Assessment Report**

Disaster Type: Flooding

**Building Analysis Summary:**
Total buildings analyzed: 11
• No damage: 6 buildings (54.5%) - These structures show no visible signs of damage
• Major damage: 1 buildings (9.1%) - Significant structural damage requiring extensive repairs
• Completely destroyed: 4 buildings (36.4%) - Structures are completely demolished or collapsed

**Impact Severity:**
Classification: Moderate Impact
Assessment: Moderate damage levels with 45.5% of buildings affected. Significant recovery efforts will be needed.

**Key Observations:**
• 4 building(s) suffered complete destruction, indicating severe flooding impact
• 1 building(s) show major structural damage, likely requiring demolition and rebuilding
• 6 building(s) remained undamaged, suggesting uneven flooding impact across the area

**Recommended Response Actions:**
• Immediate safety assessment and debris clearance required
• Emergency shelter needed for displaced residents
• Coordinate with emergency services for rescue and relief operations
